statements: SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, order_date, delivery_status FROM orders WHERE order_id = 2;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, product_id FROM orders WHERE delivery_status = 'Shipped';
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE delivery_status = 'delivered' ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT order_id, customer_id, product_id FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 1001 AND delivery_status = 'pending'
SELECT order_id, customer_id, product_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT order_id, delivery_status FROM orders WHERE product_id IN (101, 102, 103) ORDER BY order_date ASC
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE customer_id IN (1001, 1002) AND delivery_status != 'cancelled'
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM order_items WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, delivery_address FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY order_id;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, item_name, quantity, price FROM orders JOIN order_items ON orders.order_id = order_items.order_id;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'Pending';
SELECT order_date, customer_name, delivery_address FROM orders WHERE order_id = 1001;
SELECT order_id, SUM(price * quantity) AS total_price FROM orders o JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id GROUP BY order_id;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_orders > 1;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
SELECT * FROM Orders
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM Customers
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity, customer_id FROM Orders WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT order_id, product_name, order_status FROM Orders WHERE customer_id = 100
SELECT * FROM DeliveryStatus ORDER BY delivery_time DESC
SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity FROM Orders WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT order_id, delivery_status, delivery_time FROM DeliveryStatus WHERE delivery_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY delivery_time ASC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, address FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM Products WHERE unit_price > 50.00;
SELECT order_id, order_date, delivery_date FROM Orders WHERE order_status = 'Shipped';
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC, customer_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price, stock_quantity FROM Products WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_status FROM Orders WHERE order_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_address LIKE '%Street%' AND customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;

SELECT o.order_id, c.customer_name, p.product_name, oi.quantity FROM Orders o JOIN Customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN OrderItems oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN Products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.customer_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY o.order_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'Shipped';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, delivery_date, delivery_status FROM orders JOIN delivery_status ON orders.order_id = delivery_status.order_id;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT customers.customer_name, orders.order_date, products.product_name FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN order_items ON orders.order_id = order_items.order_id JOIN products ON order_items.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT order_id, SUM(price * quantity) AS total_price FROM order_items GROUP BY order_id;

SELECT orders.customer_name, delivery_status.delivery_date, delivery_status.delivery_status FROM orders JOIN delivery_status ON orders.order_id = delivery_status.order_id ORDER BY delivery_status.delivery_date DESC, orders.customer_name ASC;
